item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

drubrkletern:

well if jesus says so

ye he told me man

[quote=“PvPXile, post:7, topic:469842”]src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\Competitor.java:5: error: Competitor is n ot abstract and does not override abstract method compareTo(DuelCompetitor) in C omparable public class Competitor implements Comparable<DuelCompetitor> { ^ src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\Competitor.java:37: error: method does no t override or implement a method from a supertype @Override ^ src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelCompetitor.java:34: error: method mov ePlayer2 in class PlayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types; client.getPA().movePlayer2(coords[0] + Misc.random(12), coords[1] + Misc .random(14)); ^ required: int,int,int found: int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelCompetitor.java:40: error: method mov ePlayer2 in class PlayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types; client.getPA().movePlayer2(pt[0], pt[1]); ^ required: int,int,int found: int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelCompetitor.java:46: error: method mov ePlayer2 in class PlayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types; client.getPA().movePlayer2(LOBBY_COORDS[0], LOBBY_COORDS[1]); ^ required: int,int,int found: int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelCompetitor.java:53: error: method mov ePlayer2 in class PlayerAssistant cannot be applied to given types; client.getPA().movePlayer2(LOBBY_COORDS[0], LOBBY_COORDS[1]); ^ required: int,int,int found: int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelTournament.java:101: error: cannot fi nd symbol npcs.add(server.Server.npcHandler.newNPC1(NPC_ID, x, 322 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)); ^ symbol: variable npcHandler location: class Server src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelTournamentController.java:72: error: cannot find symbol registrars.add(server.Server.npcHandler.newNPC1(NPC_ID, x, 3222, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)); ^ symbol: variable npcHandler location: class Server src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelTournamentController.java:106: error: no suitable method found for sort(List<Competitor>) Collections.sort(competitors); ^ method Collections.<T#1>sort(List<T#1>,Comparator<? super T#1>) is not appli cable (cannot instantiate from arguments because actual and formal argument list s differ in length) method Collections.<T#2>sort(List<T#2>) is not applicable (inferred type does not conform to declared bound(s) inferred: Competitor bound(s): Comparable<? super Competitor>) where T#1,T#2 are type-variables: T#1 extends Object declared in method <T#1>sort(List<T#1>,Comparator<? super T#1>) T#2 extends Comparable<? super T#2> declared in method <T#2>sort(List<T#2>) src\server\model\minigames\tournaments\DuelTournamentController.java:124: error: no suitable method found for sort(List<Competitor>) Collections.sort(competitors); ^ method Collections.<T#1>sort(List<T#1>,Comparator<? super T#1>) is not appli cable (cannot instantiate from arguments because actual and formal argument list s differ in length) method Collections.<T#2>sort(List<T#2>) is not applicable (inferred type does not conform to declared bound(s) inferred: Competitor bound(s): Comparable<? super Competitor>) where T#1,T#2 are type-variables: T#1 extends Object declared in method <T#1>sort(List<T#1>,Comparator<? super T#1>) T#2 extends Comparable<? super T#2> declared in method <T#2>sort(List<T#2>) Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .

10 Errors, I’ve been told its not compatable?[/quote]

I’m not really sure what you did wrong… lol. Did you finish adding everythnig before you compiled?

public void movePlayer2(int x, int y) { c.freezeTimer = 2; c.resetWalkingQueue(); c.teleportToX = x; c.teleportToY = y; requestUpdates(); }

that should fix 1 of your prioblems.

item.title: [PI] Duel Tournaments ["Best minigame ever" - Jesus]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[size=20pt]EVERY CLASS YOU NEED IS RIGHT HERE:
ER MER GERD CLERK MER
ER MER GERD CLERK MER
ER MER GERD CLERK MER
ER MER GERD CLERK MER[/size]

I released this as a snippet, but it was useless because nobody(that wanted it) could get the code working.

This isn’t perfect, and it’s not exact to RuneScape, cause that would be unnecessary imo. There’s a lot of code involved in this, so hold on tight! If you don’t know what Duel Tournament is then you haven’t lived. But, it’s exactly what it says, a tournament… You ante in, and you keep killing people and advancing into a new round. Eventually, IF you win, you will be rewarded (ante amount * players) amount of GP. I have tested this, and there are no bugs that I’ve encountered and it works great for me. You might love up when adding it, but that’s your fault, not mine. Anyways, plz rep me plz im begging u.

Let’s get into it!

First:

Open up the ClickingButtons class and search for

and find somewhere within that case to add this

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 3626) { //duel tournaments if (c.isInTournament) { DuelTournament.removePlayer(c); } else { DuelTournament.addPlayer(c); } }

Next:

This part is a bit tricky, and you can love some stuff up if you do it wrong.

Go into PlayerAssistant and search for giveLife

search for

then under that find something like this

} else { // we are in a duel, respawn outside of arena if (o != null) { o.getPA().createPlayerHints(10, -1);

SOMEWHERE near that, you should see

Make that look like this

if (c.tourneyStatus == 0) { movePlayer(Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0); } else { c.tourneyStatus = 0; }

Next:

Go into client.java and search for process()

in there add this

if(isInTournament) { getPA().showOption(3, 1, "Attack", 1); }

then search for public void logout()

and add this

if (isInTournament) { DuelTournament.comps.remove(this); this.tourneyStatus = 0; }

DO THE EXACT SAME THING IN THE DESTRUCT METHOD!!!

also, declare these anywhere

public boolean isInTournament = false; public boolean isInArena = false; public int tourneyStatus = 0;

Next:

in Server.java

under the main server tick add this

Next:

Open up TradeAndDuel and in the startDuel method search for something like this

if(c.duelRule[8]){ if(c.duelRule[1]) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.duelTeleX, c.duelTeleY, 0); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3366 + Misc.random(12), 3246 + Misc.random(6), 0); } } else { if(c.duelRule[1]) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.duelTeleX, c.duelTeleY, 0); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3335 + Misc.random(12), 3246 + Misc.random(6), 0); } }

surround it with this if statement like this

if(!c.isInTournament) { if(c.duelRule[8]){ if(c.duelRule[1]) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.duelTeleX, c.duelTeleY, 0); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3366 + Misc.random(12), 3246 + Misc.random(6), 0); } } else { if(c.duelRule[1]) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.duelTeleX, c.duelTeleY, 0); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3335 + Misc.random(12), 3246 + Misc.random(6), 0); } } }

then search for(BE CAREFUL HERE ALSO)

you should see something like this

duelRewardInterface(); c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 3);

Make that look like this

if(c.isInTournament) { DuelTournament.reportWinner(c); } else { duelRewardInterface(); c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y+(Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 3); }

Next:
In DialogueHandler

add this

case 3626: if (c.isInTournament) sendNpcChat2("Welcome to the Duel Tournaments!", "Do you want to leave the tournament?", c.talkingNpc, "Registrar 1"); else sendNpcChat2("Welcome to the Duel Tournaments!", "Do you wish to pay " + DuelTournamentConfiguration.ENTRY_FEE + " coins to enter?", c.talkingNpc, "Registrar 1"); c.dialogueAction = 3626; c.nextChat = 3627; break; case 3627: sendOption("Yes", "No"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

And we should be done…

Post any errors, unless they’re retarded.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NbfkvSNL70Y[/youtube]

figure out floors yourself muthaloveas

Read full topic
